text: Service level at the reception can be improved especially towards closing hours. Very defensive and quite unwilling for patients to see the doctor due to closing hours. We understand the constraints but if the patient is not well and is already at the clinic, I hope the staff can be more compassionate.
Receptionist is pleasant. Very rare to find nowadays. Went back to this clinic which was further from my house because of this. Doctor is great too.

First time here. Dr Tan was very patience and gentle. He explained the necessary things we need to know. Thank you doctor.

They turn on video of animal with calming music. Very soothing.

The staff is also nice.

Warm reception, instant registration, doctor who cares with professional consultation, and speedy checkout! Last but not least they offer Teleconsult too. Please visit this 5-star clinic when youâ€™re in need.

Edgedale's clinic staff are always lovely and helpful. Entitled patients who always turn up just 15mins or lesser before closing should be condemnd. If you are sick you should seek medical treatment EARLY in the day, not wait until the end of the day to see Dr
